<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Fetch Master Account Details (AWS Org)</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/config/v3/account/awsorg/{id}"}></MethodEndpoint>



Returns the necessary attributes that define the AWS ORG account necessary for various PCDS flows.

## Request
